name: The Pandemonium Podium
description:
Important!

If you spam NEXT the intro will go faster and you can skip parts.

Play in fullscreen mode and with headphones for the best experience.

Description: Story:

You play as a young trumpeter, trying to make your dreams come true with your first real performance in a strange jazz bar with a pretentious audience. But, beware of how you play in this free jazz club. People there want something really unique and chaotic.

Controls:

Play the trumpet: 

Signal a bandmate to start playing:
